game.name: Burger Diner Cook  Create
game.description:
The time has come when you need to try your hands in creating most in-demand food recipes. What could be a better idea than preparing and serving Burger â€“ the most liked recipe among kids, teenagers and grownups? If you are ready to practice and learn how to create a mouth-watering burger masterpiece, then you must join Burger Diner: Cook Create right away. Click the Start button to learn how to prepare a delicious dinner recipe for your loved ones!

Assemble all the ingredients that you see on the screen to prepare your delicious dinner with the help of your mouse. Make sure to go through the instructions and implement them in a proper sequence to ensure the better outcome. Check out a few useful and tasty ingredients to decorate your burger in this one of the best decoration games for girls! Begin it with frying out some burgers on a fry pan using a stove. Once you are done, place your burger into the pan and fry it out until it is cooked. Keep doing the process until you prepare all the burgers. 

After completing the above mentioned step, you have to click the next step in this one of the best cooking games for kids. Then open the fridge, choose an item and drag it ono the chopping board. Now chop the ingredients using the knife. Then again click the next step. Feel free to choose the ingredients you want to have in your burger and get ready to taste the scrumptious burger in your dinner! Press redo button to start your game again! Enjoy more food games by browsing through a huge list of our top online game website!
